column4: hi. i have a kind of noob question,but hey. Is there any youtube-downloader-type app for ubuntu ?? except for  flashcache script,and youtube-dl and windows programs throught Wine.. any Gui app ?  Thanks
by the way,sorry for my bad english
there's a plugin you can add to ffox that does the job
Yes,i know..i just wondering if i could find a standalone GUI app. Anyway, many thanks
